title: Dazzling Eid Al Adha Celebrations at Four Seasons Hotel bahrain bayTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Dazzling Eid Al Adha Celebrations at Four Seasons Hotel bahrain bay Published on : Friday, September 4, 2015
This Eid Al Adha, Four Seasons Hotel Bahrain Bay impresses again with a series of well-crafted offers to ensure a memorable Eid filled with stylish entertainment and extravagant culinary fare.
Take Out Your Taste Buds with a Trip to Bahrain Bay Kitchen
For those craving for an appealing culinary journey, the Hotel is offering a three–day Eid Al Adha Brunch on the first three days of Eid. Guests are invited to enjoy an exciting atmosphere with live band in the Hotel’s all day dining restaurant Bahrain Bay Kitchen, every day from 12:00 noon to 3:00 pm.
The Eid Brunch buffet features a great variety of festive dishes as well as international fare. Divided into five live cooking stations including Arabic, Western, Chinese, Japanese and Indian cuisines, where guests can enjoy the restaurant’s lively atmosphere while pampering their taste buds with myriad great flavours.
The Asian section appeals with Chinese and Japanese delicacies such as the traditional Peking duck, Chinese roast chicken, veal spare ribs, cuttlefish char siu, lamb char siu, and a wide selection of sushi, sashimi and dim sum such as chicken siu mai, prawn siu mai and many more. Guest are welcome to taste slow cooked roast beef, harissa honey glazed chicken, Yorkshire pudding, and the forever favourite Bahraini hammour to mention a few at the Western station. The Oriental section offers a wide variety of local and regional dishes such as the popular lamb ouzi, oriental rice, bamya, Persian joojeh, and a careful selection of Moroccan tagines. The very popular chocolate shawarma as well as the Turkish delights bar will put a sweet ending to the celebrations.
Source:-Four Seasons
